title: Glorious Chocolate
detail_text: <:th_ch0207/>Kotori-san, take a look at my Glorious Chocolate!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Waaah, did you make these, Setsuna-chan?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Yeah. We have a chocolate exchange party tomorrow! Also, I figured if I make extras, I can bring some refreshments for the Aqours live today.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>What is this red thing that is sticking out?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Takanotsume peppers! I saw that there are some spicy chocolates using peppers on the internet. I feel like I need something as hot as this to express my passion.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>....What about this green thing?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>That’s kale. Kale is so high in nutrition that it’s even called a superfood. I put it in so people wouldn’t feel guilty eating just chocolate.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>....Fufu. It’s nice. I can feel the energy and attentiveness from it. How very like you, Setsuna-chan. I have a suggestion though, may I?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>What is it?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>I think we can transform this Glorious Chocolate into something more. Maybe into.... an Amazing Chocolate!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Amazing Chocolate.... That sounds great! Please make it together with me, Kotori-san!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
